ygData.subject: If I get kicked out, then this may be my final E-Mail to Neo Beast Wars...
ygData.msgSnippet: OCC: Some guy without authority (As far as I m concerned, only the owner should be allowed to kick someone out.) says that I m dismissed, but I am still with

Subject: If I get kicked out, then this may be my final E-Mail to Neo Beast Wars...

	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

OCC: Some guy without authority (As far as I'm concerned, only the owner sh=
ould be allowed to kick someone out.) says that I'm dismissed, but I am sti=
ll with the RPG at the moment, and I don't care if I get kicked out because=
 it won't affect my life and my life may actually be better without this RP=
G because of the fact that I'm sick of the harrassment that I've gotten fro=
m most of the RPG instead of the fun I was promised. The only reason for me=
 to stay is because I have a few friends here, even though they didn't even=
 reply when I sent them the URL to my site I still call them friends becaus=
e they didn't kick me when I was down. You guys that think you rule the RPG=
 are the ones that I will never forgive for the small things and the big th=
ings that they have done to me, a few of them are council members but I won=
't mention names. I won't forgive for causing me torment over the time I wa=
s in this RPG. I also have a minor grudge against Yanshosh for the fact tha=
t he doesn't do something about some idiots that are always moding, and a g=
rudge for everything else that he did to me, like saying I'm the worst RPer=
 ever when everybody moded on me and I was accused of it all! Well I have m=
y own RPG, and all you people have done since I stepped into this hellhole =
is put me down and think your better than me. Well your not better than me,=
 my site is much better in many people's opinions and I will soon have more=
 members as my site gets more popular. I've decided that I don't need this =
RPG to be happy, and if I get kicked out it will be no big deal. I apologiz=
e to Moon Mist, Carnage Dinobot, Josheph Frey, (Thanks for joining my RPG, =
dude!) and Iron Raptor. I apologize to them for leaving if I do, but i'm su=
re you know how I feel. you people Who are not already part of my RPG are w=
elcome to join. I encourage you people to at least take a look at it, if yo=
u will not join. My RPG also allows Autobots and Decepticons as long as the=
y get reformatted into smaller bodys, and you are allowed to make vehicles =
and animals both. The URL is http://www.homestead.com/spacestationomacron/R=
PGHomePage.html 
The final story for my characters is below, and it is so t=
hat just in case I get kicked out my characters don't disappear without a t=
race. Please disregard this post if you decide to keep me in the group, but=
 be warned that I will not take your crap any more, and if someone treats m=
e with disrespect once more, then I leave and this post becomes active and =
will be what happens if I do leave at anytime, this is a post for just in c=
ase I get kicked...

Below is emergency post with the end of my characters =
for just in case I get kicked out...

Deemos the wizard's ship touches down=
, he invites all of the People's Group inside except for Wrath and Kamodia =
because they aren't my characters and he repairs them fully. Gangon leaves =
also, saying goodbye to BrightBlade, but also saying that he will be back o=
ne day. Lightmare, who now had no more interest in Gangon, went as well. Al=
l 14 bots were on board, and they took off back to Cybertron, and lived hap=
pily ever after...

THE END for my characters if I happen to get kicked out=
!..........Simply That......Now hit...my...MUSIC!!!......

http://www.homes=
tead.com/spacestationomacron/RPGHomePage.html

                    "SOULSTI=
CE"



------=_NextPart_000_00A7_01BFD0E4.4D45BC80
